conversations.content: How much did I spend on shopping today?

<|Function_Thought|>
The current day is 2024-05-19. Now, I need to view the order history to determine how much was spent on shopping today.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_order_history() ]<|/Function_Call|>

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<|Function_Thought|>
From the order history, there are two orders placed on 2024-05-19:
1. Portable SSD 1TB
2. SpeedStep Running Shoes

However, the order history does not provide the prices, so I need to get the invoices for these orders to find out the total amount spent today.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-112543")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The invoice for order "ORDER-112543" has been sent to the email inbox. I will now retrieve the invoice for "ORDER-113219" to calculate the total spending.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-113219")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
Both invoices for the orders placed today have been sent to the email inbox. To find out the total amount spent, I should check the email for the invoice details.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|>The invoices for the orders placed today have been sent to your email inbox. Please check the email for the detailed amount spent on today's shopping. If you need further assistance in retrieving the amounts from the invoices, feel free to let me know!<|/Final_Answer|>
